caption: It has taken me a while, but I have found my best value sushi spot in the Fox River valley. Two people can eat here for a very reasonable price. I ordered 4 rolls, and each of them was big (but not too big) and  well made. The fish was fresh, and the service was friendly. I plan on ordering again!
Best sushi I’ve ever ate. I highly recommend going here 💯

We ordered sushi from here about 6 weeks ago and have been ordering ever since. Easily the best sushi around! Sushi is always fresh and they have added their own personal touch to their menu. The azul am and Cancún are my personal favoriteS. If you’re in the area give them a try, you will not be disappointed!
Fantastic! We ordered the boat filled with sushi for my birthday and everyone loved it!

I always travel to Schaumburg or to the city for the best sushi but I decided to give this place a try. When I say this was probably hands down one of the best sushi places I've ever tried I'm not exaggerating. The sushi rolls tasted SO fresh and I have no doubt in my mind they used the freshest ingredients to make them because you can taste it! 😍😍 Awesome customer service too! I'm addicted, and so, so happy this place is just a few blocks from home! Give them a try you won't be disappointed!! 🙌🏼🙌🏼🙌🏼🙌🏼
Amazing quality & always delicious sushi!! Love the Philadelphia roll & Crunchy Spicy Tuna :)
If you are in Elgin give them a try. Food was excellent, good portions, and steak was perfect. We tried the noodles as well they were good. Rice was really good too. Everything was cooked to order.

I’m very impressed with the quality of the food here. It has a chain restaurant feel to it. It’s a gem here in Elgin because it’s clean, fresh and the dream hall looks amazing inside.  The food tastes great and you won’t be disappointed. Highly recommended the yaki noodles with soy sauce.

Excellent Sushi - very creative too. Not the typical offerings found at most local places. Presentation is excellent too. Love the Hot Mama and Dream Rolls. Looking forward to try the Hibachi entrees soon.

Excellent and fresh sushi. Highly recommend the Dream Roll and One’s Roll if you want to try something new. Friendly staff, great at answering questions and making recommendations. Would go back again.

The Hibachi and Sushi is amazing! Fried Rice and veggies are done perfect. I got the Salmon and calamari combo and it was to die for. It was great talking to the sushi chef  he is a funny guy.  Id say they are the best in the elgin area!  Infinity/10 will go go back. Also unlike the other reviews I did receive Chop Sticks and Soy sauce!

Ordered online as they don't answer the phone, arrived at the specified time, then waited an additional 20 minutes for a raw sushi order. One ~15 year old 'chef' making sushi at this place, about the quality you'd expect. They don't include soy sauce. Nice kids, not sure what the plan here is though.
We got the chicken and filet mignon hibachi plates. Very good! Make sure you get the yum yum sauce!
Got it with no chopsticks,  no soy sauce. Rolls were okay.
